name: @bluefly/open-standards-scalable-agents
description: Open Standards for Scalable Agents (OSSA) - Research-enhanced specification for universal AI agent interoperability with ACTA and memory systems integration

scripts.validate: echo '⚠️ DEPRECATED: Use CLI instead: ossa validate' && node lib/cli.js
scripts.validate:legacy: echo '⚠️ DEPRECATED: Use CLI instead: ossa validate --legacy' && node lib/tools/validation/validate-ossa-v0.1.2.js
scripts.validate:verbose: echo '⚠️ DEPRECATED: Use CLI instead: ossa validate --verbose' && node validate-oaas-v1.3.0.js --verbose
scripts.test: echo '⚠️ DEPRECATED: Use CLI instead: ossa validate examples/' && npm run validate examples/
scripts.migration-help: echo 'Migration Guide: docs/MIGRATION_GUIDE.md' && echo 'CLI Install: npm install -g @bluefly/open-standards-scalable-agents@0.1.6'

author: Open Standards for Scalable Agents Community
